title: PBE Testing
body: Back in November, I applied to become a PBE tester, and I got approved around March. However, clicking the link that says "CREATE YOUR PBE ACCOUNT" never works and just sends me to the Error: 500 page. I'd love to become a tester, but it somehow won't let me. Suggestions?

replies.body: I looked into this for you, and do see you've been approved.  The 500 error is an issue that some player shave been getting, and an issue we've been investigating.  We don't have a fix right now, but some players have been able to workaround this by using a VPN.  Additionally, make sure that you're using the correct url to get in.  See if[ this one](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe-signup) works just in case.  I hope that helps!
i would write a ticket to the riot games support. maybe they can help.
